title: "About This Website"
---

This is website provides summary information from a number of different sources on the numbers of publications. This website is built for the EQUATOR Network <http://www.equator-network.org/>. 

This website is hosted by the Centre for Research in Evidence-Based Practice at Bond University, for more information please visit this website <http://www.crebp.net.au/research/australasian-equator-centre/>.

Please contact Alexandra Bannach-Brown <mailto:alexandra_bannachbrown@bond.edu.au> if you have any questions.
